lead_paragraph: A state judicial oversight body has filed a formal ethics complaint against the chief justice of the Alabama Supreme Court.

headline.print_headline: Top Alabama Judge Suspended Over Order to Deny Same-Sex Marriages
headline.main: Roy Moore, Alabama Judge, Suspended Over Gay Marriage Stance

snippet: A state judicial oversight body has filed a formal ethics complaint against the chief justice of the Alabama Supreme Court.
abstract: Alabama Supreme Court Chief Justice Roy S Moore has been suspended from bench and faces possible hearing before state's Court of Judiciary; suspension follows filing of formal complaint by judicial oversight body over Moore's orders to state probate judges to refuse applications for marriage licenses by same-sex couples.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
